'''Andy Serkis''' is an English actor. He portrayed [[Gollum]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings (film series)'']] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit (film series)'']]
column2: as well as providing voices for various characters in ''The Lord of the Rings (film series)''. He was the second unit director for ''The Hobbit (film series)''.

column1: When he heard from his agent that [http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0399193/ John Hubbard] wanted to hear him as the voice of an animated character
column2: Serkis originally felt dismayed. When told it was Gollum
column3: it changed little: he had read ''[[The Hobbit]]'' when he was eight
column4: but nothing else. Not until his (later) wife Lorraine convinced him to go to the audition did he actually think of doing it.

column2: in which he portrayed Gollum full of self-pity and guilt
column3: and he based the gulping swallow sound "gollum" on his cat Diz coughing up a furball.
and this diary was later edited to become ''[[Gollum: How We Made Movie Magic]]''. It details his casting

column1: Serkis spent a total of five years in [[New Zealand]]
column2: and did extra work later in London. He dubbed most of his lines as Gollum there
column3: and also provided an eerie voice for the [[Witch-king]] of [[Angmar]]. Together with [[Jim Dunk]]
column4: he also voiced most of the [[Uruk-hai]] in [[Uglúk]]'s troop.
